Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm trying to complete the intermediate construction tutorial, but when I get to the part where you add the engine, there are no engines unlocked to add. I don't know if it's a bug or if i'm missing something obvious but  I was really enjoying the tutorials so far and would really like to continue

screenshot of what I can see in engines tab

I think that’s an issue with the new Swivel and Reliant engines, the tutorials are old and a bit dated and probably haven’t been updated to use the new versions of the engines. You could raise a bug on the KSP bug tracker here and it’ll get fixed eventually, but I believe you can still find the old engines if you rummage through the advanced editor options- click the arrows in the top left of the screen then select one of the other tabs, then just search through until you find the old engines.
